attributes.action: Legislate for Freedom of Speech to be protected as a fundamental human right
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Freedom of Speech is the foundation of any Democracy because true Democracy can only exist where all views are tolerated & all views are open to challenge. In any free & open society, people must be able to express their views or challenge any accepted wisdom, without fear.

This government has done more than any other to erode our ancient right to Freedom of Speech. The criminalisation of any view or idea & the application of moral imperatives [political correctness] is inconsistent with Democracy. It should be the people who tell the government what to think & not the other way round!

Whether through arrogance, idealism or fear.. this government has brought us closer than any other to an Orwellian nightmare.
